Talk_008:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Hey! Didn't I tell you to stop
eavesdropping?!
Talk_007_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Could you get lost already?! This is a
two-person conversation, so stop trying to
listen in! Seriously, what's your...<sp:5:1:0>deal...
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Wait. <sp:5:1:0>That nobleness to your bearing...
Could it be? Are you that Yiga who just
became a blademaster?!
<snd:Sad_00>Please forgive me for my rudeness!
Talk_007_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Could you get lost?!<sp:5:1:0> This is a private
conversation, so get your fancy helmet...<sp:5:0:0>
out of here...<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>That's...<sp:5:1:0>the Li...<sp:5:0:0>Lightning Helm!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>But that would mean...<sp:5:0:0>y-you're the
new blademaster!<sp:0:4:0><snd:Sad_00>Please forgive my rudeness.
Talk_007_4:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Could you get lost?!<sp:5:1:0> This is a private
conversation, so get your fancy helmet...<sp:5:0:0>
out of here...<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>That's...<sp:5:1:0>the Li...<sp:5:0:0>Lightning Helm!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><snd:Sad_00>Please forgive my rudeness.
Talk_000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Even compared to the others, this branch
is REALLY well hidden. <sp:5:1:0>And Link still
found us and messed things up!
Talk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Does the <clr:0000>Lightning Helm<clr:ffff> really work?


I mean, it's metal, right? How's lightning
supposed to bounce off of it? I figured the
research team was playing a joke on me!
Talk_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I admit, he did hurt us by setting our
tailors free.

But no matter. We will rebuild. Remember,
these branches exist to advance Master
Kohga's control over the Depths.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Besides, it's better he raid our branches
than attack our hideout and try to take
our <clr:0000>Lightning Helm<clr:ffff>.
Talk_008_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Er, excuse me. I'm nervous enough talking
to one blademaster, let alone two. I beg
you, please, stop listening in for a while.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yeesh, can you imagine a zap-proof Link?
What a nightmare.
Talk_008_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Er, excuse me. That helm's so...<sp:5:0:0>dauntingly
impressive, it's kind of hard to chat in
front of you...<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Don't worry. Even if Link makes it to the
hideout, there's an army of our best guys
waiting for him. He won't stand a chance.
Talk_005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's no joke. The helm is a very special
piece of equipment. From what I hear, you
don't choose to wear it, it chooses you.
Talk_006: <sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm sorry, hold that thought for a second.
Talk_007:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>What do you want? A Yiga's supposed to
eavesdrop on enemy conversations. It's
just plain rude to do it to your allies!
